section.name: Overview
section.div: Stripes-Guice is a small library/extension that brings Guice DI functionality to the Stripes web framework. It provides a means to initialize Guice modules and inject Stripes ActionBeans, ActionBeanContexts, and more.

ul.li: Initialization of Guice Modules via a ServletContextListener named GuiceContextListener.
Inject constructors and members on ActionBeans, ActionBeanContext, Interceptors, and ConfigurableComponents using standard Guice mechanisms.
Ability to provide custom means of retrieving Guice Injector through a custom GuiceInjectorFactory.
Classes to aid in unit testing.
